title: Mark Ryan
author: Mark Ryan
content: Hi there, after months of thinking about it, I'm still struggling... As a newbie, which brand of mining rig should I choose at the beginning?

comments.author: Jack_Tsai
comments.body: You can consider S19(antminer) or whatsminer M30 which is popular in Russia.WhatsApp ID:+86 13917517268

comments.author: altair_tech
comments.body: Whatsminer M20 and M30 series is very reliable. Antminer S19 and S9 are quite reliable but stay away from S17 series.

comments.author: hZti
comments.body: Antminer is good and very reliable. If you buy a new one you should find a good seller that offers warranty anyway, since this is your best option to be completely safe.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: Jack_Tsai on January 13, 2023, 06:55:57 AMYou can consider S19(antminer) or whatsminer M30 which is popular in Russia.WhatsApp ID:+86 13917517268Scam Alert !Â  OP, you should have a look one the Hardware section of this Mining forum. You will find all the answers you are looking for, but as the others said, IMO to find a good seller is at least as important as the brand of your ASIC

comments.author: CoZmo73
comments.body: What about Avalon from Canaan ?Im looking for an A11 or A12 from them, but don't know which on is the most stable ?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: CoZmo73 on January 15, 2023, 05:13:11 PMWhat about Avalon from Canaan ?Im looking for an A11 or A12 from them, but don't know which on is the most stable ? Canaan units are cheap and both your units that you mention are stable the only problem is that their units are power-hungry.But if you have a cheap electricity rate Canaan units is a good choice than Antminer units.

comments.author: CoZmo73
comments.body: Since my post in january i bought an Canaan Avalon A1166 81T for $810.https://shop.canaan.io/products/avalon-miner-a1166-pro-81t-3400w?VariantsId=10012Good price for it i think.

comments.author: Canaan Online Shop
comments.body: Quote from: CoZmo73 on February 05, 2023, 07:40:52 PMSince my post in january i bought an Canaan Avalon A1166 81T for $810.https://shop.canaan.io/products/avalon-miner-a1166-pro-81t-3400w?VariantsId=10012Good price for it i think.Hi there, thanks for choosing our Avalon miners A1166 Pro-81T, now we have A13 series available, stay tuned

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: Mark Ryan on January 13, 2023, 05:48:12 AMHi there, after months of thinking about it, I'm still struggling... As a newbie, which brand of mining rig should I choose at the beginning? Antminer S19 is one good brand of miner you would really love to make use of particular as a newbie. Here's a link to a material (post) that exposes certain details about it https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5436532.msg61644308#msg61644308
